short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Encrypt, decrypt, store, and sync textual data using SHA-256 Hash algorithm
short.de: Verschlüsseln, Entschlüsseln, Speichern und Synchronisieren von Textdaten mit dem SHA-256-Hash-Algorithmus
short.fr: Cryptage, décryptage, stockage et synchronisation de données textuelles à l'aide de l'algorithme de hachage SHA-256.
short.it: Cifrare, decifrare, memorizzare e sincronizzare dati testuali utilizzando l'algoritmo SHA-256 Hash
short.ja: SHA-256ハッシュアルゴリズムを用いたテキストデータの暗号化、復号化、保存、および同期
short.nl: Tekstgegevens coderen, decoderen, opslaan en synchroniseren met SHA-256-hash-algoritme
short.pt_BR: Criptografar, decodificar, armazenar e sincronizar dados textuais usando o algoritmo SHA-256 Hash
short.pt_PT: Encriptar, decifrar, armazenar e sincronizar dados textuais usando o algoritmo SHA-256 Hash
short.ru: Шифрование, расшифровка, хранение и синхронизация текстовых данных с использованием алгоритма хэширования SHA-256
short.zh_CN: 使用SHA-256哈希算法对文本数据进行加密、解密、存储和同步。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This extension enhances your right-click context menu for text selections with the following options:

1. Securely copy selected text to the clipboard with encryption.
2. Encrypt selected text and securely save it in synchronized storage.
3. Replace the original content with encrypted text.

In addition, it offers the ability to:
4. Decrypt encrypted text and copy it to the clipboard.
5. Decrypt encrypted text and replace the original content.

Important details about the extension:
- The extension uses your passphrase to generate a new SHA-256 private key and a random public key for text encryption and decryption.
- Please remember your passphrase, as there is no way to recover encrypted text if it is forgotten. For your privacy, the extension does not store passphrases.
- You can choose to store encrypted content in your browser's synchronized storage for easy access across synced browsers.

Some use cases for this extension include:
1. Safely encrypting passwords when sending emails.
2. Privately archiving important data.
3. Securely transmitting sensitive information, like passwords, to another device.

Privacy assurance:
This extension operates entirely offline, ensuring no data is sent to any external server.
long.de:
Schützen Sie Ihre Inhalte mit einer Passphrase (wird in einen privaten SHA-256-Schlüssel umgewandelt).

Optionen:
Verschlüsseln Sie Inhalte und speichern Sie sie in der Zwischenablage oder im synchronisierten Speicher
Entschlüsseln Sie Inhalte und fügen Sie sie in die Seite ein oder speichern Sie sie in der Zwischenablage

Anwendungsfälle:
1. Verschlüsseln Sie Ihre Passwörter beim Senden einer E-Mail
2. Einige private Daten sicher archivieren
3. Senden Sie private Daten wie Passwörter sicher an eine andere Maschine

--

Protect your content with a passphrase (converts to SHA-256 private key).

Options:
Encrypt content and store them in the clipboard or synced storage
Decrypt content and paste them into the page or save it to the clipboard

Use cases:
1. Encrypt your passwords while sending an email
2. Archive some private data securely
3. Send private data such as passwords to another machine securely
long.fr:
Protégez votre contenu avec une phrase secrète (convertie en clé privée SHA-256).

Option :
Chiffrez le contenu et stockez-le dans le presse-papiers ou le stockage synchronisé
Décryptez le contenu et collez-le dans la page ou enregistrez-le dans le presse-papiers

Cas d'utilisation :
1. Chiffrez vos mots de passe lors de l'envoi d'un e-mail
2. Archivez certaines données privées en toute sécurité
3. Envoyez des données privées telles que des mots de passe à une autre machine en toute sécurité

--

Decrypt content and paste them into the page or save it to the clipboard

Use cases:
1. Encrypt your passwords while sending an email
2. Archive some private data securely
3. Send private data such as passwords to another machine securely
long.it:
Proteggi i tuoi contenuti con una passphrase (converte in chiave privata SHA-256).

Opzioni:
Crittografa il contenuto e salvalo negli appunti o nell'archivio sincronizzato
Decrittografa il contenuto e incollalo nella pagina o salvalo negli appunti

Casi d'uso:
1. Cripta le tue password durante l'invio di un'e-mail
2. Archivia alcuni dati privati in modo sicuro
3. Inviare dati privati come password a un'altra macchina in modo sicuro

パスフレーズでコンテンツを保護します（SHA-256秘密鍵に変換します）。

オプション：
コンテンツを暗号化し、クリップボードまたは同期ストレージに保存します
コンテンツを復号化してページに貼り付けるか、クリップボードに保存します

ユースケース：
1.メール送信時にパスワードを暗号化する
2.一部の個人データを安全にアーカイブする
3.パスワードなどの個人データを他のマシンに安全に送信する

long.nl:
Bescherm uw inhoud met een wachtwoordzin (converteert naar SHA-256 privésleutel).

Opties:
Versleutel inhoud en sla ze op op het klembord of gesynchroniseerde opslag
Decodeer inhoud en plak ze in de pagina of sla het op op het klembord

Gebruiksgevallen:
1. Versleutel uw wachtwoorden tijdens het verzenden van een e-mail
2. Archiveer sommige privégegevens veilig
3. Stuur privégegevens zoals wachtwoorden veilig naar een andere machine

long.pt_BR:
Proteja seu conteúdo com uma senha (converte em chave privada SHA-256).

Opções:
Criptografe o conteúdo e armazene-o na área de transferência ou armazenamento sincronizado
Descriptografar o conteúdo e colá-lo na página ou salvá-lo na área de transferência

Casos de uso:
1. Criptografe suas senhas ao enviar um e-mail
2. Arquive alguns dados privados com segurança
3. Envie dados privados, como senhas, para outra máquina com segurança

Decrypt content and paste them into the page or save it to the clipboard

Use cases:
1. Encrypt your passwords while sending an email
2. Archive some private data securely
3. Send private data such as passwords to another machine securely
long.pt_PT:
This extension adds 4 items to the right-click context menu over selections. You can either encrypt selection or decrypt it to the clipboard or as a replacement to the original text. The extension uses your passphrase as SHA-256 private key and a random public key to encrypt or decrypt the selection.

This extension can be used for instance to encrypt your passwords while sending an email or when you want to archive some important data.

Important note: there is no way to decrypt the encrypted text if the passphrase is forgotten. To protect user privacy the extension does NOT store your passphrases.
long.ru:
Защитите свой контент с помощью парольной фразы (преобразуется в закрытый ключ SHA-256).

Опции:
Шифруйте контент и сохраняйте его в буфере обмена или в синхронизированном хранилище.
Расшифруйте содержимое и вставьте его на страницу или сохраните в буфер обмена.

Сценарии использования:
1. Зашифруйте свои пароли при отправке электронной почты
2. Надежно заархивируйте некоторые личные данные
3. Безопасно отправляйте личные данные, такие как пароли, на другой компьютер.

3. Send private data such as passwords to another machine securely

使用密码保护您的内容（转换为 SHA-256 私钥）。

选项：
加密内容并将它们存储在剪贴板或同步存储中
解密内容并将其粘贴到页面中或将其保存到剪贴板

用例：
1. 发送电子邮件时加密您的密码
2. 安全存档一些私人数据
3. 将密码等私人数据安全地发送到另一台机器
